summary: This document is a chain of emails from December 2018, with an embedded earlier email from March 2016. The 2018 emails show a request for notes and records from a meeting with Peter Skinner regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The 2016 email from Skinner shares a news article about Epstein and introduces attorney Sigrid McCawley, indicating coordination on legal matters related to Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Peter Skinner
persons.context: Sends emails in 2016 sharing a news article about Jeffrey Epstein and introducing attorney Sigrid McCawley; is the subject of a 2018 request for meeting notes and records.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Introduced by Peter Skinner in a 2016 email as one of the lead attorneys on the case, with knowledge of the facts, and is copied on the correspondence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in a 2016 email regarding a news article about his continued relationships with young women, and is the central subject of the legal case discussed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in an attached complaint for a defamation case against her; her motion to dismiss was denied.

connections.description: Skinner introduces McCawley as a lead attorney on the case and includes her in the email chain for follow-up.
McCawley is described as a lead attorney on the case involving Epstein, indicating a legal representation relationship.
Skinner is discussing legal case materials and news related to Epstein, suggesting involvement in the legal matters surrounding him.

events.title: PageSix Article on Epstein
events.description: A PageSix article reports on Jeffrey Epstein's continued relationships with young women, shared via email by Peter Skinner.

events.title: Meeting with Peter Skinner
events.description: A meeting occurred involving Peter Skinner and other recipients, discussing the Epstein case and sharing legal documents.

events.title: Request for Meeting Notes
events.description: An email request is made for notes and records from a prior meeting with Peter Skinner regarding Epstein.

keyFacts: In March 2016, Peter Skinner shared a PageSix article reporting on Jeffrey Epstein's continued relationships with young women.
Sigrid McCawley was introduced as a lead attorney on the Epstein case in February 2016, indicating active legal proceedings at that time.
A defamation case against Ghislaine Maxwell was ongoing, with a motion to dismiss being denied.
Legal documents related to the case, including a complaint, declarations, a Rule 56.1 statement, and a redacted 302, were being circulated among attorneys in early 2016.
In December 2018, there was a follow-up effort to obtain notes and records from a 2016 meeting with Peter Skinner, suggesting continued investigation or legal activity.
